main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted over Columbia, South Carolina on June 26, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright, disc-shaped object traveling at a high rate of speed and high altitude.
The object was estimated to be approximately 50 feet in diameter and was visible for around 2 minutes before disappearing.
Several witnesses provided consistent descriptions of the object, and it was determined not to be a conventional aircraft or other known aerial vehicle.
No physical evidence or tangible data, such as photographs, were obtained during the investigation.
The incident was reported to the Air Force for further investigation and action as deemed appropriate.
